body_html:
I'm not very convinced by some of the modifications in this PR.

I think it will be very confusing for the users to realise that the order that it's printed in their ModuleList is not the one they were expecting, and which does not correspond to the order that they will access the items.
Also, the nice namings 0/1/2 in the print is replaced by a large random number.
body_text:
I'm not very convinced by some of the modifications in this PR.
I think it will be very confusing for the users to realise that the order that it's printed in their ModuleList is not the one they were expecting, and which does not correspond to the order that they will access the items.
Also, the nice namings 0/1/2 in the print is replaced by a large random number.
body:
I'm not very convinced by some of the modifications in this PR.

I think it will be very confusing for the users to realise that the order that it's printed in their `ModuleList` is not the one they were expecting, and which does not correspond to the order that they will access the items.
Also, the nice namings `0`/`1`/`2` in the print is replaced by a large random number.
